title.en: Fundamentals of Personnel Management for Nursing Managers

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

description.en: Concepts of personnel management and talent management; areas of personnel management and its relations to internal and external environments of an organisation; planning of human resources, hiring and choosing of employees; motivating and remunerating; staff development and career management; trends in personnel management.
description.et: Personalijuhtimise ja talendijuhtimise mõisted; personalijuhtimise valdkonnad ja seosed organisatsiooni sise- ja väliskeskkonnaga; inimressursi planeerimine, personali värbamine ja valik; motiveerimine ja tasustamine; töötajate arendamine ja karjäärijuhtimine; personalijuhtimise trendid.

objectives.en: To develop knowledge and an understanding of the principles of personnel management, and skills to apply them.
objectives.et: Kujundada teadmised ja arusaam personalijuhtimise põhimõtetest ning oskus neid rakendada.

learning_outcomes.en: The student who has completed the course:
- knows the nature of personnel management, talent management and career management and understands the importance of these in an organisation;
learning_outcomes.et: - teab personalijuhtimise, talendijuhtimise ja karjäärijuhtimise olemust ning mõistab nende olulisust organisatsioonis;

learning_outcomes.en: - knows the principles of personnel planning, hiring of employees, evaluation, development and motivation, and is able to apply them;
learning_outcomes.et: - teab personaliplaneerimise, töötajate värbamise, hindamise, arendamise ja motiveerimise printsiipe ning oskab neid rakendada;

learning_outcomes.en: - is able to analyse and ethically resolve cases related to personnel management, and use relevant sources of information;
learning_outcomes.et: - oskab analüüsida ja eetiliselt lahendada personalijuhtimisega seotud juhtumeid ning kasutada asjakohaseid infoallikaid;

learning_outcomes.en: - is able to present his/her opinion in a reasoned manner, including in a digital environment.
learning_outcomes.et: - oskab oma arvamust argumenteeritult esitada, sh digitaalsetes keskkondades.
